ps.ptxt: Accelerator pedal position (APP) sensor circuit faulty

action.ptxt: Inspect circuit for open, short and intermittent trouble. If NG, repair.

ps.ptxt: Input shaft speed sensor circuit faulty

action.ptxt: Inspect circuit for open, short and intermittent trouble. If NG, repair.

ps.ptxt: Output shaft speed sensor circuit faulty

action.ptxt: Inspect circuit for open, short and intermittent trouble. If NG, repair.

ps.ptxt: Pressure control solenoid valve-A circuit faulty

action.ptxt: Inspect circuit for open, short and intermittent trouble. If NG, repair.

ps.ptxt: Transmission fluid temperature sensor circuit faulty

action.ptxt: Inspect circuit for open, short and intermittent trouble. If NG, repair.
Substitute a known-good TCM and recheck.
